timing_notes: Instruction set and timing identical to 68HC11. The 68HC11A1 is a ROMless variant of the 68HC11A8 with identical CPU core. Same dual index register (X/Y) architecture and all cycle counts unchanged.

instructions.notes: All 309 instructions identical to 68HC11 base. See m68hc11_timing.json for complete instruction listing. 68HC11A1 is ROMless variant of 68HC11A8 with no CPU core differences.
